actions.text: On agreeing to the Gabbard amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 50 - 372 (Roll no. 379).

description: Amendment sought to provide an additional $104 million to the Navy Research and Development account, which would authorize the full request in the President's budget.
purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 113-170 to increase funding for the Navy Offensive Anti-Surface Warfare weapon and Air-Launched Long Range Anti-Ship Missile program by $104,000,000, and reduce Operations and Maintenance, Defense-wide by the same amount.
